General.Name: Forte Biosciences Inc
General.Description: Forte Biosciences, Inc. operates as a biopharmaceutical company in the United States. It is developing FB-102 program that addresses various autoimmune diseases, such as graft-versus-host disease, and vitiligo and alopecia areata. The company is headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
General.Address: 3060 Pegasus Park Drive, Dallas, TX, United States, 75247
